pipes.name: SafePipe
ValidationMessagePipe

interfaces.name: IFormError
INgxFormModuleConfig

components.name: FormValidationErrorsComponent
components.templateData: {{error.key | validationMessage:error.value}}

components.name: ValidationControlComponent
components.templateData: {{error.key | validationMessage:error.value}}

variables.name: defaultConfig
formSample
variables.defaultValue:
() => ({
  template: `
  <form [formGroup]="group" novalidate (submit)="handleSubmit(group)">
    <ii-form-validation-errors [group]="group"></ii-form-validation-errors>
    <ii-validation-control [control]="group.controls.email">
      <input type="email" formControlName="email" placeholder="email">
    </ii-validation-control>
    <ii-validation-control [control]="group.controls.password">
        <input type="password" formControlName="password" placeholder="password">
    </ii-validation-control>
    <button [disabled]="!group.valid">Submit</button>
</form>
`,
  props: {
    group: new FormGroup({
      email: new FormControl('', [Validators.required, Validators.email]),
      password: new FormControl('', [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(8)])
    }),
    handleSubmit
  },
})

variables.name: handleSubmit
markAllFormControlsAsTouched
safePipe
setFormErrors
validateEqual
